arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim makes Man Utd priority clear as he reveals Premier League decision
arts.sum: Manchester United earned their place in the Europa League semi-finals in dramatic circumstances at Old Trafford and the success will have an impact on their Premier League plans

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim aims cheeky dig at Man Utd fans who left early after epic Lyon comeback
arts.sum: Manchester United scored three goals in six minutes against Lyon to complete an incredible comeback and book a place in the Europa League semi finals - but some fans missed it

arts.ttl: Man Utd fans remind Sir Jim Ratcliffe of their endearing value in Lyon miracle
arts.sum: Manchester United supporters helped roar the team onto victory in their Europa League clash at Old Trafford as they continue to be subjected to price hikes by the club's bosses

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim on Manchester United’s win over Lyon: ‘We can forget for a few moments the season that we are having.’
arts.sum: Manchester United’s season is still alive. Languishing in lower-mid table in the Premier League, all of their eggs are in the UEFA Europa League basket. The Red Devils got the…

arts.ttl: Paulo Fonseca explains Lyon’s meltdown against Manchester United
arts.sum: It was a game that was flipped on its head on more than one occasion. The scores were level as Olympique Lyonnais headed to Old Trafford in a bid to…

arts.ttl: From ecstasy to misery: Alexandre Lacazette bids farewell to Europe for last time with Lyon
arts.sum: It was a night of emotional highs and lows for Alexandre Lacazette (33). Coming off the bench, the Olympique Lyonnais captain netted the penalty that sent his side 4-2 up…

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim will go all out to secure Europa League glory for Man Utd
arts.sum: United will play Athletic Bilbao in the last four.

arts.ttl: Rio Ferdinand says he's 'never seen ANYTHING like' Man United's incredible win over Lyon - as Paul Scholes names the famous comeback that it reminds him of
arts.sum: Rio Ferdinand hailed Man United after their miraculous comeback against Lyon in the Europa League.

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim delivers swift Man Utd reality check after pulsating Lyon comeback
arts.sum: Manchester United advanced into the semi-finals of the Europa League with their European results covering for a horrendous Premier League campaign - which Ruben Amorim admits doesn't reflect well

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim reveals the inspiration for Man United's remarkable comeback against Lyon as Red Devils reach Europa League semi-finals
arts.sum: Man United last night pulled off the great escape to salvage their season by reaching the semi-finals of the Europa League. This club has had so many great European nights but this will be right up there.
